item.title: Benefits of becoming a CCIE
item.description: Beside of your number and that you’re recognised as CCIE you also get some small perks from Cisco: CCIE Certification Kit You will get a CCIE Certification Kit, after i got mine i will blog about it for sure! According to cisco it includes: Congratulatory letter from John Chambers Certificate of achievement Personalized CCIE plaque CCIE badge pull CCIE sticker set Certification resource document I will post the whole package and its content after i received my Certification Kit
